mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( seq, id, attend_time, attend_yn, lv_ffc_yn, work_time, reg_id, mod_id, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{id}, sysdate, #{attendYN}, #{leaveYN}, #{workTime}, #{regId}, #{modId}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET attend_time = sysdate, lv_ffc_time = sysdate, attend_yn = #{attendYN}, lv_ffc_yn = #{leaveYN}, state = #{state}, work_time = #{workTime}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE attendance SET lv_ffc_time = sysdate, lv_ffc_yn = #{leaveYN}, state = #{state}, work_time = #{workTime}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, TO_CHAR(attend_time, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS attendTime, TO_CHAR(lv_ffc_time, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS leaveTime, attend_yn AS attendYN, lv_ffc_yn AS leaveYN, state, work_time AS workTime, reg_id AS regId, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDate, mod_id AS modId, TO_CHAR(mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS modDate FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id}
